name: Chop Sushi
summary: Get caught up in sushi-matching mayhem with this innovative puzzler with hours of match 3 puzzle action as you conquer 40 challenging puzzle battles. Create unique combinations, triggering insane combos including the awesome WASABI BOMB! and unleash their devastating effects on your opponents!
